bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: CompGraph Evaluation (ROC?) bug with loop vs. doEvaluation
bug.description: Confirmed to occur on 0.9.1, also reported to occur on master. Uncomment the reset in the following code to get different evaluation behaviour. <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/AlexDBlack/b927aebf2e38906e7942111b12f07b5e>https://gist.github.com/AlexDBlack/b927aebf2e38906e7942111b12f07b5e</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
